title: What is this font?
content:
Can somebody tell me what this font is?

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [textx.jpg](http://web.archive.org/system/files?file=textx.jpg) | 30.61 KB |
author: scarlettx

comments.content: OK, I think I’ve answered my own question, just by reading through some past threads here … It’s Neutraface, right?!

Only the first line is Neutraface, as I am sure you know. Here is [Neutraface](http://web.archive.org/web/20051110034735/http:/www.orangeitalic.com/fonts/neutra.shtml) looking very smart indeed… until it reaches ‘completion’ anyway.
_Just in case.: The other one is_ ‘ [DIN](http://web.archive.org/web/20051110034735/http:/www.fontshop.com/?fuseaction=catalog.fontpackage&searchby=manufacturer&displayfontid=FF.9467.0.0)’..
